page.title: 15YOUTH CENTRE - MENSTRIE
page.content: When a new primary school was built the old building was refurbished as a Youth and Community Centre run by the local people with the help of the Youth and Community Service. Many activities take place, such as youth clubs, creche, badminton, lunch club for senior citizens. The senior Sunday School also use the premises on a Sunday as the Church Hall is used by the junior members. The local W.R.I. hold their meetings in the Centre. The Centre Committee arrange a Summer Playscheme which takes place during one week of the School holidays. Outings, sports and other activities are held.
